description:
Yahaba is a demon who directly serves http://anidb.net/ch104020 [Muzan]. While he believes that he is one of the Twelve Demon Moons, he is actually not, as he lacks a number on his eye: the mark of a Demon Moon. His power is to manipulate the movement and direction of things using the eyeballs on the palms of his hands. He works together with http://anidb.net/ch104025 [Susamaru].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Yahaba
